infos.value: Perfect. I'll make you pay for destroying my village right here and now!
Heh heh heh. A remnant of Saiga, just as I thought.
Thought I'd get the chance to meet you if I hung around with Fennes.
Unforgivable. For what you've done...I'll show no mercy!
I know it was you. You're the lowlife who killed Lady Naiah!
You're next. Then it's Mach√©rie's turn.
How daring of you to share such plans.
Heh heh heh. Not at all. Because this is the end of the line for you.
No, I cannot die here. No matter what happens!
Too bad, this is where you shrivel up and die in your regrets.
